title: How to get Greek letters on my TI-84 Plus CE (even if with a download) - Quora

response.answer_text: Don’t know - the old ASCII character set was 8-bit. But I think you’ll need to use the 16-bit unicode to include Greek characters. To use a graphical interface you may need to cut-and-paste, depending on the font. DW Αυτό έχει μετατραπεί μέσω της μετάφρασης Google
